named-query.name: findColorByName
named-query.query: select c from ColorEntity c where lower(c.name) = lower(:name)

named-query.name: getAllColors
named-query.query: select c from ColorEntity c order by c.name

named-query.name: getColorsBySetId
named-query.query: select distinct c from SetPartEntity sp join sp.partColor pc join pc.color c where sp.set.id = :setId order by c.name
